QuestData.Title: No Rest For The Wicked
QuestData.Description: These fools have actually stumbled upon something that could pose a serious threat to our plans!$b$bThe leader of this particular sect, Alumeth, has ritualistically sacrificed himself and now his underlings are channeling power to his soul.$b$bIf he's allowed to rest, their efforts will soon transform him into a mighty adversary.$b$bCombine his heart, skull, scepter and robes from around their chamber and use his remains on the crystal there.$b$bHurry, $r! Destroy him before he becomes any more powerful!
QuestData.LogDescription: Koltira, aboard Orgrim's Hammer, wants you to slay Alumeth the Ascended at Aldur'thar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $r? Were you able to stop Alumeth?
QuestData.RewardText: Alumeth has suffered a sound defeat, but I sense that his spirit still lingers...
